name: LatestVid
description: Open or download the latest video for any YouTube account. Downloaded over 350 times in the first week. Available via npm.

name: NBA Games
description: View NBA scores in your command line. Available via npm.

name: UofT Exams
description: A command line tool for UofT students to retrieve a list of exams based on various parameters including courses, lecture sections and last names.

name: NextRide API
description: A real-time scraper and API for the Brampton Transit NextRide service.

name: NowPlaying
description: Control iTunes playback through the command line.

name: SeenIt
description: Stream video content from /r/videos. Replacement for the now-deprecated Reddit.tv.

name: ShowMeAMovie
description: Search and stream movie torrents using their IMDb token. Received over 600 downloads in the first month. Available via npm.

name: TIL
description: View random TILs from /r/todayilearned. Available via npm.

name: Tweetbot
description: Automatically reply to all mentions that contain a specific phrase on Twitter.

name: WikiArticles
description: An aggregator for reading and saving random articles from Wikipedia.
